title: Imagine...
text: A bubble measuring 0.000001mm.. Even with a lineup of one million Ultra Fine Bubbles (UFB), the combined size would only reach approximately 1 mm. These bubbles are so minuscule that they elude visibility even under a microscope,  exemplifying the dimensions of UFB technology. In contrast to regular water  bubbles, which ascend and vanish in roughly 8 seconds, ultra-fine bubbles exhibit remarkable longevity, enduring underwater for about 1 to 2 years.

section.title: Why Antd?
section.content: Ant Design is a React UI library that has a lot of easy-to-use components for building elegant UI.

section.title: Why styled-components?
section.content: Styled Components gives you total control over your components.
